div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 333 Delos, 1909 Burial: 88 B.C. or later (Hackens) Contents: 11 AR, 95 AE. Pot hoards Athens: 95 AE (some with "Delian" types) Rhodes: 5 dr., 6 triob. (plinthophori) Disposition: Athens Svoronos, JIAN 1913, pp. 40-1. The publication has three separate entries, each a pot hd. from the same general area (nos. 6-7, 13, 14). It is perhaps doubtful that a single hd. is involved
